attributes.action: Allow people to describe themselves as English !  i am English and proud of it !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am English , i am not a racist , i love my country but  in forms and official aplicataions i have to say that i am British or European , NO  Sorry im English and proud of it , is that wrong ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
